comments.text:
Created attachment 510425
use HOST_LDFLAGS

When building with LTO and clang it is necessary to pass -use-gold-plugin when liknig.

comments.raw_text: Do we really care about host programs (typically, programs used when building only) being built with lto ?
comments.author: mh+mozilla@glandium.org
comments.text: Do we really care about host programs (typically, programs used when building only) being built with lto ?
comments.creator: mh+mozilla@glandium.org

comments.raw_text: Maybe not. I have been building everything with lto so that it is easy to check that it is used (no ELF .o). Once that is done I can try setting HOST_CFLAGS explicitly.
comments.author: respindola@unverified.tld
comments.text: Maybe not. I have been building everything with lto so that it is easy to check that it is used (no ELF .o). Once that is done I can try setting HOST_CFLAGS explicitly.
